songs.title: Water
songs.lyrics:
I ‘m a diamond’s aquafina

I’m thinking
Nigga so what

Better shut up
Before I send my niggas
At you
Lay you down and jack you
And let that hammer
Smack you
Get it count it up
And we gonna spend it

Just what we intended
And I hope you won't

Won’t retaliate
You just way too complaisant

I’m like diamonds aquafina
Shit like water
Shit like water

See the Bentley Coop
